AA.title: Done! Click submit and follow the link to retrieve your prompt.
Are you going to input some original text or the taxonomy?
AA.helpText:
You are being asked this question for one of the following reasons:
- You are producing an OTQ or WTQ from an existing question and you need to specify the subject matter for your new question.
- You are producing an OTQ or WTQ from scratch and you need to specify the subject matter for your new question.
- You are seeking Real world examples and you need to specify the subject matter to be illustrated by the examples.
- You are creating written material (text) from scratch and you need to specify the subject matter for your new material.

You have 2 options for the subject matter on which to base your prompt:

1/ For specific syllabus outcomes, please select the "taxonomy" option.  These taxonomies are unique to your paper and will allow you to test key syllabus areas and ensure syllabus coverage.  You can "wide-ranging by only selecting L1 or L2, or if you want to drill down into a specific area of the syllabus, you can go all the way to L4 options.

2/ If you want to specify the subject matter yourself, then you can use the "original text" option and type in your desired subject matter.

AA.title: Are you going to input the subject matter yourself, or use the taxonomy?
Question
AA.helpText:
You are creating a prompt to produce a new written or objective test question based on an existing question.

This is where you will input the existing question you are using as a template. 

Do not submit the answer here!

AA.title: Please copy the question you want to use as a template here. Note: There is a separate place for you to add the answer.
Answer
AA.helpText:
You are creating a prompt to produce a new written or objective test question based on an existing question.

This is where you will input the existing answer you are using as a template.

AA.title: Please copy the answer you want to use as a template here.
Use an uploaded document or copy the material directly into this form.
AA.helpText:
You are being asked this question because you are trying to produce one of the following prompts:
- Illustrative script
- Apply a business management model to a scenario
- Proofread
- Copyright review
- Glossary
- Teaching plan
- Rewriting text
- Reviewing existing material
- A written debrief or answer
- A script for a video question debrief or introduction to a learning module
- Produce a VOPP script from existing text
- Improve a VOPP script

In order to produce your prompt, you need to make available the content on which your prompt will be based. 

You can do this by copying the material directly into this form, or by using all or part of an uploaded document.

AA.title: Do you wish to use the content of an uploaded document or copy the material directly into this form?
options: Copy the material directly into this form

conditionalLogic.option: Copy the material directly into this form

AA.title: OTQ from scratch or existing
AA.helpText:
You can create objective test questions from scratch, or by using an eisting objective test question as a template.

Note: If you are using an existing question as a template, you can change the subject matter of the question whilst keeping the style and standard of the original question. Later on, you will be asked to specify the required subject matter for your new question(s).

AA.title: Would you like to prepare the OTQ from scratch, or use an existing Q as a template?
options: Use existing question as a template

conditionalLogic.option: Use existing question as a template

AA.title: Learner performance
AA.helpText:
Please state the level of performance you want illustrated.

The illustration will identify issues with:
- Addressing the requirement - Workings - Technical knowledge - Clarity of writing - Calculations. 

Note: In the following questions you will have the opportunity to input the resources which will be used to generate the script (e.g. Question, Answer, Marking guide). Alternatively you will have the option to use all or part of an uploaded document instead.

AA.title: What level of performance would you like to illustrate?
Would you like to use all the uploaded document, or just part?
AA.helpText: Note - if you select 'all' the next question will ask you whether you want to use the taxonomy or your own text to identify the subject matter of your new question.

AA.title: Which part?
AA.helpText:
Please identify the specific part of the uploaded document which you wish to use. (avoid using page numbers) Examples:

- Test your understanding 2
- Illustration 9
- Question 33 and Answer 33
- Chapter 12 Deferred taxation
- Chapter 11 Hedge accounting, S4.2 Criteria for hedge accounting

AA.title: Please identify the specific section of text you want to use.
Content
AA.helpText:
In order to produce your prompt, you need to make available the content on which your prompt will be based. 

You must do this by copying the material directly into this form.

You are being asked this question because you are trying to produce one of the following prompts. In brackets are shown the nature of the text you need to input here:

- Illustrative script (The question, answer and if available, marking guide, on which the illustrative script will be based)
- Apply a business management model to a scenario (The scenario)
- Proofread (The document to be proofread)
- Copyright review (The document to be reviewed)
- Glossary (The document from which to produce the glossary)
- Teaching plan (The original teaching plan)
- Rewriting text (The text to be rewritten)
- Reviewing existing material (The material to be reviewed)
- A written debrief (The question and answer from which the debrief will be written)
- A written answer (The question for which an answer is to be written)
- A script for a video introduction to a learning module (The material being introduced)
- A script for a video question debrief ( The question and answer to be debriefed in the video)
- Tax update (The material to be updated)
